topic:topic.topic:name: bstan 'gyur/
bstan bcos 'gyur ro 'tshal/
Tengyur
Tenjur
丹珠尔
丹珠尔大藏经
dan zhu er
dan zhu er da zang jing
topic:topic.topic:description: bde bar gshegs pa'i bka'i dgongs 'grel bstan bcos 'gyur ro cog te/ rgya gar mkhas pa'i bstan bcos bod skad du 'gyur ba glegs bam brgya phrag lhag tsam bzhugs pa rnams so/ de rnams kyi khrod du nang don rig pa kho na gsungs pa glegs bam 170 lhag bzhugs pa grub cha gtso bo yin cing / da dung tshad ma'i bstan bcos kyi glegs bam po ti 21 tsam dang / sgra rig pa po ti 4/ gso ba rig pa po ti 5/ bzo rig pa po ti 1/ sna tshogs glegs bam po ti 9tsam bcas bzhugs pa yin no//
